title: (x) Wallpaper/Spruce font - custom font, Chalet Book {Dav, Marc O}
content:
WALLPAPER- SPRUCE font ? anybody know the name of it (see img.) ? Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMGP7240.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113184736/http:/typophile.com/files/IMGP7240.jpg) | 15.1 KB |
| [IMGP7241.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113184736/http:/typophile.com/files/IMGP7241.jpg) | 42.04 KB |
author: nik

comments.content:
For what it's worth, the smaller type underneath the headline ("A global directory...") is set in Chalet Book.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=140&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113184736/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=140&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=140&subpage=viewfonts")

The headline might be a custom version of Chalet -- many of the letters match, but the s is wrong.

Custom ' [Spruce](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113184736/http:/www.rgb107-6.com/rgb107_6/rgb/modern/_html/spruce8.html)' type, by [Fidel Peugeot](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113184736/http:/www.rgb107-6.com/rgb107_6/rgb/modern/_html/spruce1.html)..

_\* This thread should be in the ' [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113184736/http:/typophile.com/forum/29)', rather than ' [General Discussions](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113184736/http:/typophile.com/forum/4)'.. :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131113184736/http:/www.formlos.net/)

thanks guys!!

your help much appreciated.

Marcox:  
Chalet Book seems correct! Tks!

Dav:  
spot on with Fidel. Thanks!  
´had a look at your homepage, really nice stuff!

/nik
